title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the finish button, the JAR packager displays the following error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: After entering all the required information in the JAR packager, pressing the finish button results in a failure message indicating that the JAR creation has failed due to unsaved editors.
EB: After entering all the required information in the JAR packager, pressing the finish button should create the JAR file successfully without any error messages.
SR: 1. Open a file and make some edits but do not save it. 2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project. 3. Enter all the necessary information in the JAR packager, including the path, destination, and name for the JAR file. 4. Press the finish button to initiate the JAR creation process and check for any error messages.
